A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Star Wars: The Last Jedi is a great... example of why Star Wars needs to be taken away from Disney and given back to the fans.  In fact\, this movie has convinced me that the only character worth salvaging is Poe.  The Last Jedi tries to portray everything Poe does as arrogant and wrong\, yet he's the only one making the sensible calls in a desperate war.  This movie shows me the writers don't understand the scenarios they themselves set up.
